Received 401 status code, Session(Authorization) has expired, please open YouTube once, refresh it, the captured Session and other information will be saved to \nâ€¦/Android/media/com.google.android.youtube/headers.txt \n to open the youtube and return to normal after seeing video list to continue to check this application. The Session is valid for one hour, and needs to be re-acquired after the expiration. Please understand the trouble!

Please grant folders: â€¦/Android/media/com.google.android.youtube/headers.txt permissions, open the youtube captured by the request header information will be kept in here (for account verification, refresh Session one hour, if the failure to open the youtube please make it refresh)
There was an error. Do you want to try again? Error message:%s

The comment section under no account still does not find the comment after refinding the setting times, which will be determined as ShadowBan. In order to avoid the misjudgment caused by the deletion of the comment section under the account during this period, check again whether there is this comment section under the account. \n(page %d)

When enabled, an automatic detection dialog box will pop up after your comment is sent.
Delete the tracking parameter after the share URL \"?si=xxx\" to protect privacy
Switch youtube.com/redirect to the link you intended to open to avoid slow opening and malicious privacy collection
Disable switching to portrait screen when background returns
Disable rotating your landscape video to portrait detail page when returning from background
